functions.name: IsInvalidDocumentVariableName
functions.documentation: Returns true if the passed name is invalid for a DocumentVariable. Document variable names must begin with a letter and then may consist of letters, numbers and underscores.

signature.label: IsInvalidDocumentVariableName(name: string)
signature.documentation: Returns true if the passed name is invalid for a DocumentVariable. Document variable names must begin with a letter and then may consist of letters, numbers and underscores.
